hizbs.text: munibina ilayhi wa-ittaquhu wa-aqimu l-salata wala takunu mina l-mush'rikina
mina alladhina farraqu dinahum wakanu shiyaʿan kullu hiz'bin bima ladayhim farihuna
wa-idha massa l-nasa durrun daʿaw rabbahum munibina ilayhi thumma idha adhaqahum min'hu rahmatan idha fariqun min'hum birabbihim yush'rikuna
liyakfuru bima ataynahum fatamattaʿu fasawfa taʿlamuna
am anzalna ʿalayhim sul'tanan fahuwa yatakallamu bima kanu bihi yush'rikuna
wa-idha adhaqna l-nasa rahmatan farihu biha wa-in tusib'hum sayyi-atun bima qaddamat aydihim idha hum yaqnatuna
awalam yaraw anna l-laha yabsutu l-riz'qa liman yashau wayaqdiru inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna
faati dha l-qur'ba haqqahu wal-mis'kina wa-ib'na l-sabili dhalika khayrun lilladhina yuriduna wajha l-lahi wa-ulaika humu l-muf'lihuna
wama ataytum min riban liyarbuwa fi amwali l-nasi fala yarbu ʿinda l-lahi wama ataytum min zakatin turiduna wajha l-lahi fa-ulaika humu l-mud'ʿifuna
al-lahu alladhi khalaqakum thumma razaqakum thumma yumitukum thumma yuh'yikum hal min shurakaikum man yafʿalu min dhalikum min shayin sub'hanahu wataʿala ʿamma yush'rikuna
zahara l-fasadu fi l-bari wal-bahri bima kasabat aydi l-nasi liyudhiqahum baʿda alladhi ʿamilu laʿallahum yarjiʿuna
qul siru fi l-ardi fa-unzuru kayfa kana ʿaqibatu alladhina min qablu kana aktharuhum mush'rikina
fa-aqim wajhaka lilddini l-qayimi min qabli an yatiya yawmun la maradda lahu mina l-lahi yawma-idhin yassaddaʿuna
man kafara faʿalayhi kuf'ruhu waman ʿamila salihan fali-anfusihim yamhaduna
liyajziya alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati min fadlihi innahu la yuhibbu l-kafirina
wamin ayatihi an yur'sila l-riyaha mubashiratin waliyudhiqakum min rahmatihi walitajriya l-ful'ku bi-amrihi walitabtaghu min fadlihi walaʿallakum tashkuruna
walaqad arsalna min qablika rusulan ila qawmihim fajauhum bil-bayinati fa-intaqamna mina alladhina ajramu wakana haqqan ʿalayna nasru l-mu'minina

al-lahu alladhi yur'silu l-riyaha fatuthiru sahaban fayabsutuhu fi l-samai kayfa yashau wayajʿaluhu kisafan fatara l-wadqa yakhruju min khilalihi fa-idha asaba bihi man yashau min ʿibadihi idha hum yastabshiruna
wa-in kanu min qabli an yunazzala ʿalayhim min qablihi lamub'lisina
fa-unzur ila athari rahmati l-lahi kayfa yuh'yi l-arda baʿda mawtiha inna dhalika lamuh'yi l-mawta wahuwa ʿala kulli shayin qadirun
wala-in arsalna rihan fara-awhu mus'farran lazallu min baʿdihi yakfuruna
fa-innaka la tus'miʿu l-mawta wala tus'miʿu l-suma l-duʿaa idha wallaw mud'birina
wama anta bihadi l-ʿum'yi ʿan dalalatihim in tus'miʿu illa man yu'minu biayatina fahum mus'limuna
